abstract.p: Some of the ways that alternative goal structures impact financial management are theoretically and empirically reviewed. Although the ultimate role of finance in a quasi-market context remains far from clear, ignoring the disparity between fact and the neoclassical model of management behavior is an inadequate interim compromise.
